p.s: The drama A Raisin in the Sun, written by Lorraine Hansberry and published in 1959, is about the Familyfamily Younger, which is a poor african americanAfrican American family living in a Ghettoghetto in Chicago, dreaming of a better life.
The extract of the drama is a conversation between Ruth and Walter, who are married.
The conversation is about Walter telling Ruth about his dream to open a liquor store with two friends.
He wants to finance the liquor store with the paycheck over 10000$ which the family getgets.
But Ruth does not think that opening a liquor store is the best idea and is annoyed by Walter.
Furthermore Walter wants to be the one in the family who earns the money and take care of the family.
